bibl.title: The Painted Tomb from Wardian and the Antiquity of the Saqiya in Egypt.
bibl.note: The Wardian Tomb (Alexandria) is dated in the 2nd century B.C. [cf. Eadem, JARCE 25 (1988) pp. 77-91]. The Saqiya is probably an Alexandrian invention of the 2nd century B.C.
Venit Marjorie Susan, The Painted Tomb from Wardian and the Antiquity of the Saqiya in Egypt.
